tags.name: srui-content-dropdown
tags.description:
This component generates a button that can switch on and off a dropdown overlay with flexible content.
The width of the overlay can be set, as well as a content max height that enables inner content scrolling.
Header and footer slots are provided.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Font Icon name for the dropdown toggle button

attributes.name: iconSrc
attributes.description: Icon image location (src) - ignored if a font icon is set

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label for the dropdown toggle button

attributes.name: subLabel
attributes.description: Sub-label for the dropdown toggle button

attributes.name: overlayWidth
attributes.description: Static width of the dropdown overlay

attributes.name: contentMaxHeight
attributes.description:
Max height of the dropdown overlay content (excluding header and footer slots).
If content exceeds this height, the content will scroll

attributes.name: labelMaxWidth
attributes.description: If true will set main label (srui-icon-button) with a max with

properties.description: Font Icon name for the dropdown toggle button

attributes.description: If true, marks the icon with a red overlay disc

attributes.name: hideLabelMobile
attributes.description: Removes the label in mobile (only icon shows)

attributes.name: maxWith
attributes.description: if true will set label max with to 250px
